title: HTML
description: A markup language for structuring and presenting web content.

title: CSS
description: A style sheet language used for describing the presentation of a document.

title: JavaScript
description: A programming language used to create dynamic and interactive web content.

title: JSON
description: A lightweight data-interchange format that is easy for humans and machines to read and write.

title: API RESTful
description: A software architectural style that defines constraints for creating web services.

title: Swagger
description: A toolset for documenting and testing RESTful APIs.

title: GitHub
description: A platform for version control and collaboration.

title: Codespaces
description: A cloud development environment available in GitHub.

title: GitHub Pages
description: A hosting service for static websites directly from a GitHub repository.

title: React.js
description: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces.

title: Next.js
description: A React-based framework for building server-side rendered and static web applications.

title: Vercel
description: A platform for frontend developers to deploy websites and applications.
